title: Ep. 245 - Regarding the Duke by Grace Callaway
itunes:title: Ep. 245 - Regarding the Duke by Grace Callaway
description:
HEY HBs! Holly and Nat our here with Regarding the Duke by Grace Callaway! Our first AMNESIA BOOK. But, we have some content warnings. This book leans heavily on the fetishization of....Sultans. We were also surprised. So there is much discussion on the page of (consensual) sex slave role play and the white MMC role playing a sultan. We want you to go in with open eyes and ears.
Bonus Content: The worst kids that have ever been in a romance, Harry Kent (not a euphemism), female cow names, leaning into birthday weekends, and how nice it would be if someone made us a schedule everyday.
Lady Loves:
Holly - canned wine!
Nat - just forget vegetables and sleep for one weekend, because, HEY! It's your birthday.
https://bit.ly/3HiuN5z (Click here for SECRETS!!)
Make sure to check out Mel's new podcast https://bonkers-romance.captivate.fm/listen (Bonkers Romance)! 
Subscribe! Rate! Review! Tell all your friends :)
Get more content on https://www.patreon.com/heavingbosomspodcast (PATREON!!)
Sign up for our https://www.heavingbosoms.com/ (Newsletter)!
